title: Green Droid Watch Face
description: Green Droid Watch Face is the watch face for  Android Wear device.- Analog clock, with optional digital clock- Color theme support- Show/Hide Date and Day- Show/Hide watch and phone/tablet battery level- configurable watch face background- configurable clock hands- configurable per second or continuous tick mode- Interactive mode - change color theme by tapping on the dial area- Interactive mode - change background by tapping on lower area of watch face- Interactive mode - change hand type by tapping on the center area- Interactive mode - show/hide date, day, digital time, watch battery, phone battery by tapping on respective area- Interactive mode - configurable quick launch application icon
descriptionHTML:
Green Droid Watch Face is the watch face for Android Wear device.
- Analog clock, with optional digital clock
- Color theme support
- Show/Hide Date and Day
- Show/Hide watch and phone/tablet battery level
- configurable watch face background
- configurable clock hands
- configurable per second or continuous tick mode
- Interactive mode - change color theme by tapping on the dial area
- Interactive mode - change background by tapping on lower area of watch face
- Interactive mode - change hand type by tapping on the center area
- Interactive mode - show/hide date, day, digital time, watch battery, phone battery by tapping on respective area
- Interactive mode - configurable quick launch application icon
comments: Nice watchface after size increase Thanks to developer for resizing the display where practical. Now fits the Sony Smartwatch 3 screen very well. Looking forward to future additions to this watchface.
It's good but I'd like more color customization Add some more color options please like red
Love it Really like this app love the customization abilities ‚ù§üíöüíúüíôüíõ

Super cool It's clever and has just the right customizations, but now it wont let me change color theme to anything but blue grey. Can you fix? - somehow the issue is resolved. It is changing color theme just fine now!
Love it. A bit of a battery hog but I still like it. If I won't be able to charge watch throughout the day I have to run a stock watch face. But I normally don't care because I like this one so much.

- Interactive mode - change hand type by tapping on the center area
